title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
description: The user set aliases for the columns in a data set, but when they try to select the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are still displayed instead of the aliases.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases that were set for the columns of the selected dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set aliases for the columns in a data set.
2. Open the expression builder.
3. Select the dataset that was given aliases for the columns.
4. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
